adjectives.description: eatable (comparative more eatable, superlative most eatable)

examples: The contents of the pan began to boil, and he turned to plunge his hand into the bowl; I conjectured that this preparation was probably for our supper, and, being hungry, I resolved it should be eatable;

entries.meaning: (chiefly in the plural) Anything edible; food.
examples: The Excise which is laid very high throughout all Sicily, especially upon all eatables and wearing apparel is usually there  […]
